thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Volt Information Sciences Announces New Financing Agreement With DZ Bank AG

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Volt Information Sciences Announces New Financing Agreement With DZ Bank AG

organizations.name: brief-volt information sciences announces new financing agreement with dz bank ag

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Volt Information Sciences Inc:
* VOLT INFORMATION SCIENCES ANNOUNCES NEW FINANCING AGREEMENT WITH DZ BANK AG
* SAYS‍ UNDER TERMS, DZ BANK WILL PROVIDE A TWO-YEAR, $115 MILLION FACILITY WHICH PERMITS BORROWINGS UNTIL JANUARY 25, 2020​
* SAYS ‍EXITED ITS FINANCING RELATIONSHIP WITH PNC BANK​ * SAYS “‍NEW FACILITY HAS LESS RESTRICTIVE FINANCIAL COVENANTS AND FEW RESTRICTIONS ON USE OF PROCEEDS”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
